section1.title: WHERE CODE COMES TO LIFE
section1.text_part1: Built by devs for devs, OnlyCoders turns your snippets into

section2.title: TURN SNIPPETS INTO VALUE
section2.subtitle: Creative, social, and rewarding, OnlyCoders is the fastest way to turn snippets into value.

cards.title: Create MetaFragments
cards.description: Transform your best snippets into vibrant collectibles, each tagged by language and rarity levels that unlock as your fanbase grows alongside you.

cards.title: Grow Your Fanbase
cards.description: Share exclusive drops, grow with your followers, and watch your creations get acclaimed by the best dev community in the world. Be a pioneer.

cards.title: Earn & Trade
cards.description: Drop them, set the price, and decide whether they're plentiful or ultra‑limited. The Community will create value for you and them while trading.
